name: werthog42
text: that technique works pretty well, trust me

name: finemusk
text: Nice to see Molly get the punchline

name: pogo
text: Play "Misty Eyes" for me.

name: flynn
text: I like the idea of putting on a tie to show approval so much that I will now carry one in my back pocket at all times.

name: tekende
text: So, eight months on, are you still doing this? Inquiring minds want to know.

name: flynn
text: I did until I discovered that a dark blue tie hanging out of your back pocket denotes a willingness to partake in certain activities in a certain part of town.

name: tekende
text: Heh, that is indeed rather unfortunate.

name: jonmw
text: That is hilariously unfortunate.

name: lucid
text:
And somewhere there was a certain someone who took it personally.

"Get this, he said he kept the tie in his back pocket in case someone served him an excellent meal. Why couldn't he just say I wasn't his type?"

name: doomchild
text:
There are much less tasteful ways of being indecently propositioned.

DC

name: selbencoirlo
text: I find it difficult to believe that this joke wasn't planned ahead of time. But I believe anyway; I believe because I love you.

name: tekende
text: I dunno, man, a year between setup and punchline? That'd be some serious dedication there.

name: selbencoirlo
text: And that's a good thing because I don't love him that much.

name: epicurus
text: Dudes who are like 89 and have extremely red watery eyes  are not long for this world, studies show.

name: qwerty
text: A comment left by qwerty was marked lame too many times and excluded. name: agika
text: Dead children really get Roast Beef down.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
Nolan on the other hand...

[IMGS OFF]

name: greenkoolayd
text: they get everyone(that has a soul) down......

name: dissembly
text: Yeah, dead children are kind of jerks.

name: craigola
text: Okay, but when he says the money is "fairly hot," what does that mean? Is it enough that I could quit my current job?

name: william
text: Alt Text: When you're new you never get the Hopes and the Spellings.

name: mikebox
text: I was just about say I missed Molly.

name: greenkoolayd
text: i miss your mom.

name: geozimmdrake
text: man i totally forgot until right now that molly used to be dead and her and beef met in heaven and used to get along.

name: niklas
text: Every time beef sees a child, he can't help imagining them dying :(

name: hyetal
text: A comment left by hyetal was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Triptaphane, VandenBos, lastpolarbear, twohats, mystkmanat, jocelynthepink)

name: tellumo
text: Naah, I think she's just trying to convince him that the job's no good for him. Sure, he's trying to support himself and Molly, but she's pointing out that even after considering the "fairly hot at least" money, the job will take enough of an emotional toll on him that it'll be a net loss.

name: hyetal
text:
Why would I write something like that? I rescind my antique comment. Beef, don't take a job you don't like when there are plenty who will.

Children are pretty awful.

name: patkun
text: Chubby for rare internet remorse.

name: xi
text: A comment left by xi was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tekende, riotdejaneiro, Hal, instantkarma, jandruff, sexualhomeboy, Satyr, slalvation)

name: slalvation
text: A comment left by slalvation was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, NeoNaoNeo, XI)

name: tropicana
text: Veal even makes me sad, when I think about a calf being separated from his mother and put in a little box where they don't give him a good diet or let him get exercise. It tastes like sadness.

name: slalvation
text: A comment left by slalvation was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by TommyTheBrat, riotdejaneiro, Vondicus, XI, charchar)

name: mattylite
text: Wow, this made me realize the parallel about dead children and dead cow children in the strip.  Thanks, the internet.

name: greenkoolayd
text: yo tambien.  baby cows like to frolic(sp?), just baby dudes and baby dudettes.

name: boredom_man
text: I guess you'd be really annoyed with me for what I did to Harmony Korine, then.

name: 1iwikiwi3
text: Irony: cooking dead children-cows and discussing dead children. Ever wonder why they didn't choose Chicken Marsala?...

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ButterMoths, saddestking, riotdejaneiro, eatmorekix, fosters, charchar, Doc_Rostov, echidnaboy)

name: fosters
text: You are one of Little Nephew's Goth friends. Congratulations.

name: soticoto
text: Contrary to unpopular opinion I am not, in fact, fictional.

name: greenkoolayd
text: i laughed so hard that now i have to pee.

name: soticoto
text:
Plus I shower.
I don't have a bath.

name: scantman
text: This is a bit like the plot to Death and the Penguin.

name: i_love_kate
text: In that the characters have the same job?

name: achilleselbow
text: I had a job writing obituaries for non-famous people. I think this is sadder, because it makes you realize that for the majority of ordinary people, being secretary of the Garden Club is their life's greatest accomplishment.

name: straw
text: Definitely greater than the 48-year marriage and twelve grandkids.

name: clintisiceman
text: One time my girlfriend came over and made me a pizza from scratch. Made the dough herself and everything. I was dumbfounded at the effort she was putting into my appetite. So I silently stood up from my chair, went into my room, and came back wearing a tie. I think she got the message. It was such a goddamned tender moment.

name: tekende
text: "Pretty soon we were gettin' mad rutty."

name: liamc
text: Mad tender, rather.

name: greenkoolayd
text: id be willing to kill you and take my chances with such a woman.

name: tekende
text: I'm not sure you'd have much of a chance with her if you kill her boyfriend.

name: greenkoolayd
text: she would be ok with it once she got to know me.  im one hell of a catch.

name: hereward
text: A follow up strip featuring a few of the child celebrity obituaries would have been perfect. One of the achewood missed opportunities. Maybe Onstad realised there actually are no child celebrities in the public mind and thus it wouldnt work?
